page.title: 03Tamar Valley _ Lifestyle (2)
page.content: The second category of domestic life is brielfy outlined as follows: (2) From about 1970 the attractions of this area began to tempt the holiday maker to settle here, and in 1985 there is ample evidence of the 'Incomer' for whom{housing}is a converted farmhouse, cottage or a newly-built bungalow.{Home-life}shows a marked contrast to that of the farming family, with the dishwashing machine and microwave oven making domestic tasks quick and easy, often enabling the wife as well as the husband to go out to work. A good proportion of the{population} has come to this area to retire, but all are able to improve their{health} by enjoying the leisurely persuits of the river and countryside, and a climate that is warmer than the rest of the country.
